sourcesContent:
<template>
    <Line
      id="my-linechart-id"
      :chart-options="chartOptions"
      :chart-data="chartData"
    />
  </template>
  
  <script>
  import { Line } from 'vue-chartjs'
  
  import {
    Chart as ChartJS,
    Title,
    Tooltip,
    Legend,
    LineElement,
    LinearScale,
    CategoryScale,
    PointElement
  } from 'chart.js'
  
  ChartJS.register(
    Title,
    Tooltip,
    Legend,
    LineElement,
    LinearScale,
    CategoryScale,
    PointElement
  )
  
  export default {
    name: 'LineChart',
    components: {
      LineChart
    },

    data() {
      return {
        chartData: {
            labels: ['202301', '202302', '202303', '202304', '202305', '202306', '202307', '202308', '202309'],
          datasets: [ { 
            label: 'Gross Profit per month',
            backgroundColor: '#6200EA',
            data: [48756, 39668, 40789, 59230, 55100, 37190, 44190, 43876, 48176] 
        } ]
        },
        chartOptions: {
          responsive: true,
          maintainAspectRatio: false
        }
      }
    }
  }
  </script>
